text:
According to the manual, the following should work:

CustomLog "|d:\apache\bin\rotatelogs.exe d:\apache\logs\access.log 300" common

but on startup, I receive the error:

Starting Apache...
unable to start piped log program 'd:\apache\bin\rotatelogs.exe
d:\apache\logs\access.log 300': The system cannot find the file specified.
Unable to open logs
creator: mark@tweakt.net

text:
User error, I discovered that when using a piped log command, you must use all
forward slashes. This isn't noted anywhere in the docs however, perhaps a note
should be added to warn Windows people?
creator: mark@tweakt.net

text:
Quick note before closing this: This is documented -- of course -- in the
platform specific docs.
creator: nd@perlig.de
